title: Central Pa. residents tepid on construction of data centers in the region: poll
description: A third of Pa. residents said in a new poll that artificial intelligence poses a "significant threat" to humanity.
content:
A third of Pennsylvanians surveyed said artificial intelligence poses a “significant threat” to humanity, while nearly half said AI development will have a negative impact on the economy.

title: Apple AI chief to retire as former Microsoft exec takes over
description: Apple's artificial intelligence chief John Giannandrea will retire, the company announced Monday in an AI leadership shakeup following Siri delays.
content: Dec. 1 (UPI) -- Apple's artificial intelligence chief is stepping down, the company announced Monday in an AI leadership shakeup over Siri delays, as the iPhone maker vowed to "strengthen its commitment to shaping the future of AI for users everywher... [1655 chars]

title: Elon Musk claims America's 'insanely high' $38T debt crisis can only be solved by AI, robotics
description: Elon Musk said in a new interview that he thinks robotics powered by artificial intelligence driving productivity gains and output are the only way to address the more than $38 trillion national debt.
content:
Elon Musk said in a new interview that he thinks robotics powered by artificial intelligence driving productivity gains and output are the only way to address the more than $38 trillion national debt.

title: Australia rolls out AI roadmap, steps back from tougher rules
description: SYDNEY, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Australia on Tuesday unveiled a roadmap to ramp up the adoption of artificial intelligence across its economy but said it would rely on existing laws to manage emerging risks, stepping back from earlier plans for tougher rules on high-risk scenarios.

title: UChicago AI tool seeks to help renters better understand their rights
description: A group of law students at the University of Chicago is using artificial intelligence to make legal help more accessible to the general public.
content:
A group of law students at the University of Chicago is using artificial intelligence to make legal help more accessible to the general public.

title: AI turbocharges chip design: Cadence, Samsung, Tessolve units see India at heart of next
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly reshaping how complex chips are conceived, verified and brought to market, with global players such as Cadence Design Systems, Samsung Semiconductor’s Indian R&D arm and Tessolve (all three headquartered in San Jose, California), betting on AI-driven flows. Executives from Cadence, Samsung Semiconductor India Research (SSIR), and Tessolve, told ET, AI is becoming a core enabler across their semiconductor stack.
content:

title: Apple artificial intelligence head to leave after AI struggles
description: Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea plans to step down from the job, ending a challenging stint at the iPhone maker.
content:
(Bloomberg/Nick Turner) — Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea plans to step down from the job, ending a challenging stint at the iPhone maker.
